subject: Football
lead_paragraph: As a starting running back, Michael Turner of the Atlanta Falcons has been all over the place, rushing for as many as 10 yards a carry and as few as 2.2 yards a carry.
snippet: As a starting running back, Michael Turner of the Atlanta Falcons has been all over the place, rushing for as many as 10 yards a carry and as few as 2.2 yards a carry.
